basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Sergii Otryshko, a software developer with a background in law, telecommunications and customer service. I graduated  from Kyiv National Linguistic University with a master's degree in business law and after trying several different professions I fell in love with software development because of the truly unlimited number of options and possibilities it gives you and the potential to make the world a better place. Also I've always enjoyed solving puzzles so I guess I can call that the icing on the cake for me. I have various work experiences such as working as a legal assistant, cable technician and delivery driver, also I have a strong background in customer service. I firmly believe that I can leverage all my previous experience to my advantage in my new career to approach problems from non-standard angles and come up with customer-oriented solutions.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
